text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Please explain how major pharmaceutical companies were feverishly working on a vaccine in early January while at the same time the White House was saying that COVID-19 is not a threat? Did they know something you didn’t? Or were you just ignoring facts at that time?
